projects.name: Chatbot
projects.description: Experience personalized beauty recommendations with this interactive beauty chatbot. A tool designed to enhance user experience by providing instant, personalized, and automated responses to user inquiries.

projects.name: Weather app
projects.description: This React weather app seamlessly integrates the precision of the geolocation API, ensuring you receive up-to-the-minute weather forecasts that are impeccably tailored to your current location, providing a truly personalized weather experience.

projects.name: Guess who game
projects.description: Explore a captivating React app where you can play the classic 'Guess Who?' game, testing your deductive skills to identify the mystery character before your opponent does.

projects.name: Music releases
projects.description: Music releases is a React app template to display albums. Features include a structured component hierarchy, design fidelity, hover effects, and responsive layouts. Clicking on albums or artists links to external URLs. Components provided; focus on data flow and UI interactions.

projects.name: Happy Thoughts
projects.description: A React project focused on state management, API interactions for fetching and posting data. Features include a design-aligned UI, sorted thought display by recency, like count for each thought, a form for new thoughts, and a like functionality. Have a look and send your happy thoughts!

projects.name: Movies
projects.description: Explore the world of cinema with our React project, featuring popular movies fetched from themoviedb.org's API. Dive into movie specifics, enjoy responsiveness, and navigate with ease, all while maintaining that extra sprinkle of accessibility magic.
